channel.title: Comments on: Perfect
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: Mmmmm...sounds good! I'll have to try yours out to see how it is. I have a great recipe, but it calls for shortening, which isn't the healthiest of things:)Glad the baking is going well!!!
item.content:encoded: Mmmmm…sounds good! I’ll have to try yours out to see how it is. I have a great recipe, but it calls for shortening, which isn’t the healthiest of things:)Glad the baking is going well!!!
